InsiteVR | New York, NY | Full Time | ONSITE

-- What We Do --

InsiteVR (YC W15) is building a virtual reality platform that helps architects and designers easily present 3D spaces in virtual reality. Challenges we're working on: efficient mesh compression for smooth VR performance, novel VR user interfaces, data analytics of user interactions in VR, and finally making the development of VR experiences as accessible as possible to anyone who can generate 3D content.

-- What We're Looking For --
